# IUCN EICAT

- URLs:
  - https://portals.iucn.org/library/sites/library/files/documents/2020-026-En.pdf
  - https://iucn.org/sites/default/files/2023-02/eicat-guidelines-final-v1.1.pdf
- Accessed: 2026-02-08

## NBMS mapping
- `EICATAssessment.category` uses EICAT categories:
  - `MC`, `MN`, `MO`, `MR`, `MV`, `DD`, `NE` (plus optional `NA` support in enum).
- Mechanism evidence is persisted in structured JSON plus free-text uncertainty/evidence.
- Reviewer workflow fields support national technical review and publication controls.
